/initialize
    - get all the dirs, settings, etc.
    - if transcripts is None, defaults is scans if there are scans

implicit project
    - name: directory name
    - transcripts: ./transcripts || ./logs || None
    - results: ./scans

add 'filter' to the ScanJobConfig

scout view
    - workbench by default (navigation=false)
